system.effect: Navigator can reduce warp travel by 1d5 days, min 1. +25 Achievement Points towards Exploration Objectives. Poor: -10 to Warp Travel Encounter Table, Good: Reduce warp travel time by 1d5+5 days (minimum 1), Best: also +50 AchvPoints (instead of 25). One per Vessel.
